ARABIC: وَرَبُّكَ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they divulge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your Lord well knows what they hide in their breasts and what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your Lord knows all that their hearts conceal and all that they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord knows all that their hearts hide or reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And your Lord knows what is hidden in their breasts, and what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal, and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And thy Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they publish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And thy Lord knoweth what their breasts conceal, and what they publish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord knows what they conceal in their hearts and what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thy Lord knoweth that which their breasts conceal and that which they make known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Your Lord knows whatever their breasts conceal, and whatever they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thy Lord knows all that their hearts conceal and all that they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal, and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your Lord knows what their chests hide and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And your Lord knows what their hearts conceal, and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:69] And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal, [what] their hearts keep secret of disbelief and otherwise, and what they proclaim, by their tongues of such things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And thy Lord knoweth what you breasts conceal) of hatred and enmity, (and what they publish) of transgressions.
